mapper.select: SELECT comment_no, m.mem_no, bc.board_no, comment_content, comment_date FROM board_comment bc, board_post bp, member_info m WHERE bc.board_no = bp.board_no AND m.mem_no = bp.mem_no AND bc.board_no = #{bc.board_no} ORDER BY comment_no
select * from board_comment where mem_no = (select mem_no from member_info where mem_id = #{mem_id})
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment(comment_no, mem_no, board_no, comment_content, comment_date, comment_secret, board_ref, board_level, board_step) values( seq_comment_no.nextval, #{mem_no}, #{board_no}, #{comment_content}, sysdate, #{comment_secret}, #{board_ref}, #{board_level}, #{board_step})
mapper.update: update board_comment set comment_content = #{comment_content}, comment_secret = #{comment_secret} where comment_no = #{comment_no}
